summary: In May 1948, shortly before the creation of the State of Israel, hundreds of immigrants from across Europe arrive in Palestine--only to risk arrest by British troops.
cast: Andrei Kashker|Helena Yaralova|Yussuf Abu-Warda|Moni Moshonov|Juliano Mer-Khamis|Menachem Lang|Sendi Bar|Tomer Russo|Liron Levo|Roman Hazanowski|Dalia Shachaf|Keren Ben Rafael|Sasha Chernichovsky|Rawda Suleiman|Gal Altschuler|Merzei Kumkin|Igor Mirkukhanof|Veronica Nicole|Blair Pootnoi|Uzi Rosenblat
title: Kedma
